text: Sumori mohho nazdi Alloh taolo [az] ruze, ki osmonho va zaminro ofaridaast, dar kitoʙi Alloh taolo [Lavhi mahfuz] duvozdah moh ast, ki [cangu dargiri dar] cahor moh az on harom ast [Zulqa'da, Zulhicca, Muharram va Racaʙ]. In ast oini ustuvor [va rohi haq]. Pas, dar in [cahor moh] ʙar xud sitam nakuned va hamagi ʙo musrikon ʙicanged, cunonki hamai onon ʙo sumo mecangand va ʙidoned, ki Allloh taolo hamrohi parhezgoron ast
